description: Armor &3defense&r stacks for each piece worn, reducing damage further.
&3Diamond and Netherite Armor&r provide &3Toughness&r, which &dresists high-damage hits&r.
Netherite also provides &3Knockback Resistance&r, &dreducing the force of hits&r.

All armor can be enchanted with &3Protection&r, &dreducing all damage&r slightly. Alternatively, it can be enchanted with &3Projectile, &3Blast, or Fire Protection&r, resisting their respective damage type moreso.
Helmets can receive &3Respiration&r and &3Aqua Affinity&r, increasing breath time and mining speed &2underwater&r.
Boots can receive &3Feather Falling&r, &dreducing fall damage&r.
&7[Fabrication]&r &3Feather Falling V&r makes boots take &dall player fall damage&r.
